name: AVR Architecture Plugin
author: Kevin Hamacher
longdescription: This plugin adds support for the AVR architecture to binaryninja.\nIt lifts most instructions and marks the interrupt vectors by default.\nCurrently supported MCUs: Mega16, Mega168, Tiny48, Tiny88, XMega256A4. *Please read README.md for more details*.
